name: The Legend of Ogorets #3: Kikimora
description: You are aboard a ship headed straight for the center of the galaxy. The Legend of Ogorets is a series featuring mature, action-packed, character-driven adventures in post-apocalyptic settings. Your choices matter. #3 is the adventure of Kikimora, a mutant creature tortured inside her own home wherever she rests for longer than a little whilst on a migratory path to escape danger she found inside a prison society. The only problem is, everywhere is dangerous for her. Average read time: 50-60 minutes. Some readers may find this content disturbing.
